return_reasons.description: The product was smaller than expected or usual and does not fit properly.
The product was larger than expected or usual and does not fit properly.
The item received is not the item ordered.
The product was damaged or defective upon arrival.
The product does not match the description or images shown during purchase.
The customer no longer wants the product.
The product arrived later than the promised or expected delivery date.
The product quality does not meet the customer's expectations.
The product was missing parts or accessories included in the package.
